name: GetNetworkStats
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3c R4 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Gets the server's network stats and stores them in a string.

params_body.name: retstr[]
params_body.description: The string to store the network stats in, passed by reference.

params_body.name: retstr_size
params_body.description: The length of the string to be stored.
